text: You are so loved. We are going to get through this together.
Reflect on 3 things you are grateful for.
Let it come. Let it be. Let it go.
Don't forget to love yourself.
It's probably not worth getting upset about.
You have everything you need.
Savor this moment.

Everything is perfect again.
Forgive yourself.
Remember compassion - especially for yourself.
It doesn't need to be fixed.
Accept where you're at today.
OMG! You're alive right now!
Find satisfaction with the effort, not the result.

Let go.

There's no need to try so hard.

Now, take five more deep belly breaths.

This has never happened before.
